endpoints.name: Company Info
endpoints.description: Get company related information.

endpoints.name: Get all Folders
endpoints.description: This endpoint returns a list of folders and their information.

endpoints.name: Get Resources not in a Folder
endpoints.description: Get Resources not in a Folder

endpoints.name: Get Resources in a Folder
endpoints.description: This method returns an array of resources, whose format and content will be the same as the show resource endpoint.

pathParameters.name: Folder Id
pathParameters.description: Use the folder id to pull the resources you want to see.

endpoints.name: Get a Resource
endpoints.description: Specify the id of the resource to get a complete description.

endpoints.name: Get all Group Types
endpoints.description: Returns an array of all group types. Although not present in this endpoint, every group must belong to one and only one group type.

endpoints.name: Get a Group Type
endpoints.description: Returns same information about the group as in the  endpoint, as well as linked any profiles associated with that group type (zero to many).

endpoints.name: Get all Groups
endpoints.description: Returns an array of all groups.

endpoints.name: Get a Group
endpoints.description: Returns same information about the group as in the  endpoint, as well as linked any profiles associated with that group (zero to many).

endpoints.name: Get Groups from Group Type
endpoints.description: Returns an array of all groups associated with the id of the group_type.

endpoints.name: Get all Teams
endpoints.description: Returns an array of all teams as well as linked, a list of team categories.

endpoints.name: Get a Team
endpoints.description: Get a Team

endpoints.name: Get all Events
endpoints.description: Returns all events, paginated. Linked to the event is an array of any profiles that commented on the event. Only events associated with the profiles of active employees are eligible to appear.

queryParameters.name: limit
queryParameters.description: Limit of records to be retrieved; default is 30 and the limit is 50.

queryParameters.name: after
queryParameters.description: Id of the first record BEFORE the events you want to retrieve

queryParameters.name: type
queryParameters.description: The type of event you want to retrieve; examples include birthday, announcement, recent_arrival or anniversary

queryParameters.name: profile_id
queryParameters.description: Id of the profile that you wish to pull all associated events from

endpoints.name: Get an Event
endpoints.description: Returns information about a single event.

endpoints.name: Get an Event's Comments
endpoints.description: Returns all comments associated with a particular event.

endpoints.name: Get all Job Tiers
endpoints.description: Returns an array of all job tiers. Each job tier can have zero to many linked job titles (while each job title must have one and only one linked job tier).

endpoints.name: Get a Job Tier
endpoints.description: Returns information about a single job tier.

pathParameters.name: Job Tier Id
pathParameters.description: id of the job tier you want to view

endpoints.name: Get all Job Titles
endpoints.description: Returns all job titles. Each job title must have one and only one linked job tier (and each job tier can have zero to many linked job titles).

endpoints.name: Get a Job Title
endpoints.description: Returns information about a single Job Title.

pathParameters.name: Job Title Id
pathParameters.description: id of the job title you want to view

endpoints.name: Get all Notifications
endpoints.description: Returns all notifications for the current API user/token bearer.

endpoints.name: Get a Profile's Notifications
endpoints.description: Returns notifications for a profile in a paginated form.

pathParameters.name: Profile Id
pathParameters.description: id of the profile whose notifications you want to view

endpoints.name: Get all Profiles
endpoints.description: Returns all profiles (active and inactive).

queryParameters.name: per_page
queryParameters.description: The number of employees to retrieve when using pagination; default is 30 and the limit is 50.

queryParameters.name: sort
queryParameters.description: Sort order of profiles; valid values - first_name, last_name; prepend with a - (minus) sign to reverse the order. default: create_at

queryParameters.name: filter[user_status]
queryParameters.description: Returns only profiles with the defined user_status; both active and inactive are supported (inactive also returns pending profiles)

queryParameters.name: filter[first_name]
queryParameters.description: Returns only profiles with the defined first name

queryParameters.name: filter[last_name]
queryParameters.description: Returns only profiles with the defined last name

queryParameters.name: filter[email]
queryParameters.description: Returns only profiles with the defined (company) email

queryParameters.name: filter[personal_email]
queryParameters.description: Returns only profiles with the defined personal email

queryParameters.name: filter[reports_to]
queryParameters.description: Id of the profile for whose direct reports you to view; returns only those profiles

queryParameters.name: filter[job_title]
queryParameters.description: Returns only profiles with the defined job title; must be the job_title's title

queryParameters.name: after
queryParameters.description: Id of the first profile before the profiles you want to retrieve; after definition affected by sort order

queryParameters.name: profile_format
queryParameters.description: Format of the profile object; only short is supported - returns a truncated version of the profile object

endpoints.name: Get a Profile
endpoints.description: Returns same information about the profile as in the  endpoint but isolated.

pathParameters.name: Profile Id
pathParameters.description: id of the profile you want to view

endpoints.name: Get Current User's Profile
endpoints.description: Returns about the current user only (the profile that owns the access token used to access the API).

endpoints.name: Get a Report
endpoints.description: This endpoint returns a JSON format version of a report created in Namely.

pathParameters.name: Report Id
pathParameters.description: ID of the report from Namely; can be found at the end of the URL of the report on the web

endpoints.name: Get all Countries
endpoints.description: Returns all valid countries in Namely. A country is universal and may not be modified.

endpoints.name: Get a Country
endpoints.description: Returns one country, as well as a list of a countryâ€™s subdivisions (e.g. a list of its states or provinces).

pathParameters.name: Country Id
pathParameters.description: id of the country (an abbreviation of the country's name) you want to view

endpoints.name: Get all Profile Fields
endpoints.description: Returns all profiles fields as configured at your company with instructions on valid format for passing through the API.

endpoints.name: Get a Profile Field
endpoints.description: Returns information about a single Profile Field.

pathParameters.name: Profile Field Id
pathParameters.description: id of the profile field you want to view

endpoints.name: Get all Profile Field Sections
endpoints.description: Returns all profiles field sections as configured at your company.

endpoints.name: Get a Profile Field Section
endpoints.description: Returns information about a single Profile Field Section.

pathParameters.name: Section Id
pathParameters.description: id of the profile field section you want to view

operations.name: Create a Profile
operations.description: Creates a profile.

operations.name: Update a Profile
operations.description: Updates an existing profile.

operations.name: Create or Update a Profile
operations.description: Create a new and update the existing Profile

operations.name: Create Folder
operations.description: To create a folder, a title is required. An array of folders will be returned upon success, similar to folders index endpoint.

operations.name: Update Folder
operations.description: Updates the name of a folder.

operations.name: Create or Update Folder
operations.description: Create a new and update the existing one

operations.name: Delete Folder
operations.description: You must pass in the folder id to delete a specific folder.

operations.name: Delete Resource
operations.description: This endpoint deletes a specified resource.

operations.name: Create a Group
operations.description: This endpoint creates a new group.

parameters.name: Group Id
parameters.description: id of the group you want to ignore

operations.name: Update a Group
operations.description: Updates the label/name of a group.

parameters.name: Group Id
parameters.description: id of the group you want to update

operations.name: Create or Update Group
operations.description: Create a new group and Updates the label/name of a group.

parameters.name: Group Id
parameters.description: id of the group you want to update

operations.name: Delete a Group
operations.description: You must pass in the group id to delete a specific group.

operations.name: Create a Group Type
operations.description: This endpoint creates a new group type.

parameters.name: Group Type Id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the group type

operations.name: Update a Group Type
operations.description: You can update a Group Type with the viable parameters.

parameters.name: Group Type Id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the group type

operations.name: Create or Update Group Type
operations.description: Create a new and update a existing Group Type.

parameters.name: Group Type Id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the group type

operations.name: Delete a Group Type
operations.description: You must pass in the group_type id to delete a specific group_type.

parameters.description: Unique identifier of the group type

operations.name: Create an Announcement
operations.description: Creates an announcement. Other event types are auto-generated and cannot be manually created.

operations.name: Create an Event's Comment
operations.description: Creates a comment on a particular event.

operations.name: Delete an Announcement
operations.description: Delete a particular event.

operations.name: Delete an Event's Comment
operations.description: Delete a particular comment on an event.

operations.name: Create a Job Tier
operations.description: Creates a job tier.

operations.name: Create a Job Title
operations.description: Creates a job title.

operations.name: Update a Job Title
operations.description: Updates the label and/or parent (job tier) of a job title.

operations.name: Update a Job Tier
operations.description: Updates the label of a job tier.

operations.name: Create a Profile Field
operations.description: Creates a profile field within a profile field section.

operations.name: Update a Profile Field
operations.description: Updates a profile field within a profile field section. Supports changing the label and the profile field section in which it sits.

operations.name: Update a Profile Field Section
operations.description: Updates the name/label of a profile field section.
